alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 6:26PM CDT until April 27 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pickens County in west central Alabama... Southern Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Steens, or near Columbus, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. This storm has a history of producing golf ball size hail in Mississippi. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millport, Kennedy, Forest, Melborne and Shaw. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
